title: InfluxDB Tasks and Services
description:
## InfluxDB Tasks and Services

A dashboard to monitor Flux scripted tasks, as well as call and response metrics related to InfluxDB services like new user and new organization creation

- [InfluxDB Task Documentation](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/cloud/process-data/get-started/)
- [Information on Buckets](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.3/organizations/buckets/)
- [Information on Dashboards](https://www.influxdata.com/dashboards/)
- [Managing Users in InfluxDB](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.3/users/)
- [Telegraf Documentation](https://www.influxdata.com/time-series-platform/telegraf/)
- [API Token Information](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/cloud/security/tokens/create-token/)
- [Managing Organizations in InfluxDB](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.3/organizations/)
- [Scraper Documentation](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.3/write-data/no-code/scrape-data/)
